data.title: Appointments and Departures
data.text:
Clergy Appointments

The Revd David CLARK, Associate Minister in Berkswich; to also be Chaplain at Katharine House Hospice

The Revd Ashley Jane HINES, Team Vicar of Great Yarmouth St Nicholas, St Paul and St Mary (NORWICH); to be Interim Minister (known as Vicar) of Whittington with Weeford, and Hints

The Revd Peter JONES, Vicar of Keele and Silverdale; to be Rector of Chapel Chorlton, Maer and Whitmore

The Revd Mark Russell KINDER, Anglican Chaplain to HMP YOI Stoke Heath; to be Chaplain to HMP YOI Brinsford

The Revd Stephen Paul REYNOLDS, PtO; to be Assistant Curate (Interim Minister) for Great Wyrley

The Revd David STREET, Team Rector in Bucknall Team Ministry; to be Vicar of Longton Hall

Retirements and Resignations

The Revd Dr George John CROSSLEY, Vicar of Burton S.Chad and Priest in Charge of Stretton with Claymills; to retire wef 18th May 2024

The Ven Julian Montgomery FRANCIS, Archdeacon of Walsall; to retire wef 8th May 2024

The Revd Stephen John PARKER has ceased to be Lead Chaplain for Staffordshire Police wef 31st March 2024

The Revd Garry David SIMMONS, Team Rector of Glascote and Stoneydelph and Rural Dean of Tamworth; to retire wef 31st May 2024

The Revd Peter Howard SMITH, Vicar of Penn Fields; to retire wef 30th September 2024

The Revd Charles Leslie THOMAS, Vicar of Wolverhampton St Andrew; to retire wef 13th June 2024

The Revd Preb Janet Lyn WATERFIELD, Vicar of Lichfield Christchurch and Longdon; to retire wef 30th June 2024
